assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study (Nov 2021/Protocol 281–21 (227-DEFI/235-CE)) was reviewed and approved by the Ethics Committee and the Board of Directors of CHUPorto, and the Department of Education, Training and Research – DEFI. All procedures performed with human subjects were in accordance with the principles of the 1964 Declaration of Helsinki and its later amendments or comparable ethical standards.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed consent was obtained from all individual participants involved in the study prior to initiating the survey.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.
